head.title: C. E. Bird, C. M. Martin

hedline.hl1: C. E. Bird, C. M. Martin

block.p: Christine Elizabeth Bird, the daughter of Rodney Bird of Worcester, N.Y., and Elizabeth Bird of Bradenton, Fla., was married yesterday to Christopher Miles Martin, the son of Robert and Lee Martin of Camden, Me. The Rev. John Phillippe, a Methodist minister, officiated at the home of the bride's father and stepmother, Beatrice Bird, in Worcester.

Christine Elizabeth Bird, the daughter of Rodney Bird of Worcester, N.Y., and Elizabeth Bird of Bradenton, Fla., was married yesterday to Christopher Miles Martin, the son of Robert and Lee Martin of Camden, Me. The Rev. John Phillippe, a Methodist minister, officiated at the home of the bride's father and stepmother, Beatrice Bird, in Worcester.

The bride, 28, is the personnel director at Jordan, McGrath, Case & Taylor, an advertising agency in New York. She graduated from Lynchburg College. Mr. Martin, 27, is an underwriter at the Spencer Savings Bank in Garfield, N.J. He graduated from Washington and Lee University.
